name: Real Wedding Princess
description:
Help Princess get ready for the wedding, it's the most important day of her life!
Prepare Princess for her wedding with Ken giving her an exquisite bride real makeover. Begin with a facial beauty treatment to prepare her face for a fabulous wedding make up. Beautify her skin with amazing creams and masks which will make her face smooth and spotless. Next, show off your make up artist skills creating a sensational bridal make up. Finish with hair styling and dress up session.
